attributes.action: arrange for Christopher Lee to receive a knighthood in the next Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christopher Lee's services to the cinema, both in Britain and abroad, over the last fifty years and more, have been unmatched. He deserves a knighthood and it is long overdue.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
